title: Sarong
medium:
Medium: silk, gold metal thread
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft patterning
description: Sarong (kain songket) with a warp of maroon silk and weft of purple silk, brocaded with an all-over repeating leaf pattern in gold thread, with geometric borders brocaded in gold, and a wide center band heavily brocaded in gold in a stylized floral pattern.
name: Sarong
